markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=1668)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 356 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), [Hearth and Harvest](/Deities.aspx?ID=252), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=463)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You shape the wood into a rough shape of your choice. The shaping power is too crude to produce with intricate parts, fine details, moving pieces, or the like. You can't use this spell to enhance the value of the wooden object you are shaping.
name: Shape Wood

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 356 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Elven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=197), [Hearth and Harvest](/Deities.aspx?ID=252), [Sovyrian Conclave](/Deities.aspx?ID=381), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=463)

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Transform unworked wood into a shape of your choice.
</summary>
summary: Transform unworked wood into a shape of your choice.
summary_markdown: Transform unworked wood into a shape of your choice.
target: an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume
target_markdown: an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume
text: Shape Wood Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 356 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Elven Pantheon, Hearth and Harvest, Sovyrian Conclave, Yuelral Range touch Target an unworked piece of wood up to 20 cubic feet in volume --- You shape the wood into a rough shape of your choice. The shaping power is too crude to produce with intricate parts, fine details, moving pieces, or the like. You can't use this spell to enhance the value of the wooden object you are shaping.
